trans-unit.id: Thank you for staying, we really appreciate it!

trans-unit.id: These are all Vekt transactions you’ve made in the past.

trans-unit.id: We're so sad to see you go, have a lovely day!
trans-unit.source: We're so sad to see you go, have a lovely day!
trans-unit.target: We're so sad to see you go, have a lovely day!
trans-unit.note: Alert message: Tell our users we're sad that they cancel our subscription

trans-unit.source: Vekt couldn’t exist without the support of the following people.
trans-unit.target: Vekt couldn’t exist without the support of the following people.

trans-unit.source: a BMI between 18.5 and 25 is perfectly healthy. Good job!
trans-unit.target: a BMI between 18.5 and 25 is perfectly healthy. Good job!

trans-unit.source: a BMI over 30 is considered obese. You've got work to do! Stay focused on your goal.
trans-unit.target: a BMI over 30 is considered obese. You've got work to do! Stay focused on your goal.

trans-unit.source: Being obese means that you have a higher risk of developing coronary heart disease, as well as other health conditions. It is important to reduce your weight- every kilo matters. You can lower your risk by being physically active every day and eating healthy food. Consider speaking to a medical or dietary specialist if you need a hand to get there.
trans-unit.target: Being obese means that you have a higher risk of developing coronary heart disease, as well as other health conditions. It is important to reduce your weight- every kilo matters. You can lower your risk by being physically active every day and eating healthy food. Consider speaking to a medical or dietary specialist if you need a hand to get there.

trans-unit.source: a BMI over 25 is considered overweight. Good thing you're working on it!
trans-unit.target: a BMI over 25 is considered overweight. Good thing you're working on it!

trans-unit.source: Being overweight generally increases your risk of developing coronary heart disease. To get to a healthier weight, try to be physically active every day and eat well-balanced healthy food. Keep in mind that BMI doesn't paint a full picture, as it doesn't include muscle and fat measures. If you have a lot of muscle compared to fat - you are likely considered healthy too. When in doubt, consider speaking to a medical or dietary specialist.
trans-unit.target: Being overweight generally increases your risk of developing coronary heart disease. To get to a healthier weight, try to be physically active every day and eat well-balanced healthy food. Keep in mind that BMI doesn't paint a full picture, as it doesn't include muscle and fat measures. If you have a lot of muscle compared to fat - you are likely considered healthy too. When in doubt, consider speaking to a medical or dietary specialist.

trans-unit.source: a BMI below 18.5 is considered underweight. Good thing you're working on it!
trans-unit.target: a BMI below 18.5 is considered underweight. Good thing you're working on it!

trans-unit.source: Being underweight could be a risk to your health. It is important to eat well-balanced, healthy food every day. Consider speaking to a medical or dietary specialist if you've lost a lot of weight in a short time or have a hard time adding weight.
trans-unit.target: Being underweight could be a risk to your health. It is important to eat well-balanced, healthy food every day. Consider speaking to a medical or dietary specialist if you've lost a lot of weight in a short time or have a hard time adding weight.

trans-unit.source: We need to know your height and weight first
trans-unit.target: We need to know your height and weight first

trans-unit.source: Please setup your height on iPhone first
trans-unit.target: Please setup your height on iPhone first

trans-unit.source: This is %@ %@ less than your average.
trans-unit.target: This is %@ %@ less than your average.
trans-unit.note: Value, Unit (e.g. That's 2.2 kg less than your average.)
Value, Unit (e.g. That's 2.2 kg more than your average.)

trans-unit.source: You want to delete this weight entry?
trans-unit.target: You want to delete this weight entry?

trans-unit.source: Set your intention for tracking your weight.
trans-unit.target: Set your intention for tracking your weight.

trans-unit.source: We need to know your height to calculate your body mass index for you.
trans-unit.target: We need to know your height to calculate your body mass index for you.

trans-unit.source: Decide on where it gets a bit too heavy?
trans-unit.target: Decide on where it gets a bit too heavy?

trans-unit.source: Enter weight to see your progress!
trans-unit.target: Enter weight to see your progress!

trans-unit.source: Save your weight 3 more times to see your progress chart.
trans-unit.target: Save your weight 3 more times to see your progress chart.

trans-unit.source: You need 4 weigh-ins to see your progress chart.
trans-unit.target: You need 4 weigh-ins to see your progress chart.

trans-unit.note: Value Unit Date (e.g. You've gained 2.3 kg since DATE)
Value Unit Date (e.g. You've lost 2.3 kg since DATE)

trans-unit.source: Let's kick-start your healthy lifestyle by entering your first weight.
trans-unit.target: Let's kick-start your healthy lifestyle by entering your first weight.

trans-unit.source: Want a different look? You can switch around anytime you like.
trans-unit.target: Want a different look? You can switch around anytime you like.

trans-unit.source: What would be your minimum weight?
trans-unit.target: What would be your minimum weight?

trans-unit.source: Rome wasn't built in a day. Don't give up!
trans-unit.target: Rome wasn't built in a day. Don't give up!

trans-unit.source: Keep your head up! Next week is yours.
trans-unit.target: Keep your head up! Next week is yours.

trans-unit.source: It happens to the best of us. Just keep going!
trans-unit.target: It happens to the best of us. Just keep going!

trans-unit.source: One step back. Two steps forward. Chin up!
trans-unit.target: One step back. Two steps forward. Chin up!

trans-unit.source: We all have off-days. What matters is how you bounce back.
trans-unit.target: We all have off-days. What matters is how you bounce back.

trans-unit.source: Nobody said it was easy. You still got this!
trans-unit.target: Nobody said it was easy. You still got this!

trans-unit.source: Add some extra weights, you know you can do it!
trans-unit.target: Add some extra weights, you know you can do it!

trans-unit.source: Try using bigger plates, this could help you gain some weight!
trans-unit.target: Try using bigger plates, this could help you gain some weight!

trans-unit.source: Try adding oats, almonds or peanut butter to your breakfast. Get those proteins in early!
trans-unit.target: Try adding oats, almonds or peanut butter to your breakfast. Get those proteins in early!

trans-unit.source: No worries, just don't give up!
trans-unit.target: No worries, just don't give up!

trans-unit.source: Winners don't quit. They keep going.
trans-unit.target: Winners don't quit. They keep going.

trans-unit.source: Try drinking two glasses of water before meals. See if that helps!
trans-unit.target: Try drinking two glasses of water before meals. See if that helps!

trans-unit.source: Good work on measuring your weight!
trans-unit.target: Good work on measuring your weight!

trans-unit.source: Good job! You're on track to a healthy habit!
trans-unit.target: Good job! You're on track to a healthy habit!

trans-unit.source: Yes! Now give me a celebration dance!
trans-unit.target: Yes! Now give me a celebration dance!

trans-unit.source: Booom! Going straight for the kill.
trans-unit.target: Booom! Going straight for the kill.

trans-unit.source: You make me proud. Keep going!
trans-unit.target: You make me proud. Keep going!

trans-unit.source: Show 'em how it's done! Great work.
trans-unit.target: Show 'em how it's done! Great work.

trans-unit.source: You absolute legend! Keep it up.
trans-unit.target: You absolute legend! Keep it up.

trans-unit.source: Every step counts. Enjoy your progress!
trans-unit.target: Every step counts. Enjoy your progress!

trans-unit.source: Give yourself a pat on the back!
trans-unit.target: Give yourself a pat on the back!

trans-unit.source: Give access to have all your health data conveniently stored in one place. Your data is private and will never be shared.
trans-unit.target: Give access to have all your health data conveniently stored in one place. Your data is private and will never be shared.

trans-unit.source:
Using Vekt with Apple Health improves the app experience, as it automatically syncs all your health and fitness data together.
Most importantly: your data belongs to you only and never leaves your device. It is kept secure in Apple Health, encrypted and protected with your iPhone's passcode.
trans-unit.target:
Using Vekt with Apple Health improves the app experience, as it automatically syncs all your health and fitness data together.
Most importantly: your data belongs to you only and never leaves your device. It is kept secure in Apple Health, encrypted and protected with your iPhone's passcode.

trans-unit.source: Please reconsider giving access. This allows for an optimal app experience. Your data belongs to you only.
trans-unit.target: Please reconsider giving access. This allows for an optimal app experience. Your data belongs to you only.

trans-unit.target: 😄 Step onto the scale. You got this!

trans-unit.target: 💪 You're up. Get onto the scale!

trans-unit.source: Get motivated to make weight tracking a habit

trans-unit.source: 74% of Vekt users notice a healthy change in lifestyle after 3 weigh-ins
trans-unit.target: 74% of Vekt users notice a healthy change in lifestyle after 3 weigh-ins

trans-unit.source: Feel healthier, happier, and driven to kick it
trans-unit.target: Feel healthier, happier, and driven to kick it

trans-unit.source: Subscribe to unlimited support for your healthy weight
trans-unit.target: Subscribe to unlimited support for your healthy weight

trans-unit.source: Welcome to Vekt 3, our biggest update yet.
trans-unit.target: Welcome to Vekt 3, our biggest update yet.

trans-unit.source: We are giving you free access for a year.
trans-unit.target: We are giving you free access for a year.

trans-unit.source: Because we appreciate you–this is our way of saying thank you.
trans-unit.target: Because we appreciate you–this is our way of saying thank you.

trans-unit.note: Weight value, Unit (e.g. 3.2 kg to go)

trans-unit.source: Congrats! You're taking serious steps to live healthier! Ready for your next target, or want to maintain this weight?
trans-unit.target: Congrats! You're taking serious steps to live healthier! Ready for your next target, or want to maintain this weight?

trans-unit.source: Pretty proud of this one! I just hit my target of %@ %@ thanks to Vekt
trans-unit.target: Pretty proud of this one! I just hit my target of %@ %@ thanks to Vekt
trans-unit.note: Weight, Unit (e.g. I just hit my target of 43 kg thanks to Vekt)

trans-unit.source:
It is such a pleasure to build this software for you all. We hope that you are getting value from it.
For the greatest fans among us, we have a special tip option. Your name will be written on our wall, to which we look up when we drip sweat, blood, and tears, to remind ourselves that it is all worth it.
Thank you, thank you, thank you.
trans-unit.target:
It is such a pleasure to build this software for you all. We hope that you are getting value from it.
For the greatest fans among us, we have a special tip option. Your name will be written on our wall, to which we look up when we drip sweat, blood, and tears, to remind ourselves that it is all worth it.
Thank you, thank you, thank you.
